# Leadership Context Documents

## Source Attribution

These documents are LLM-generated summaries based on the foundational course materials from:

**"Being a Leader and the Effective Exercise of Leadership: An Ontological/Phenomenological Model"**

- **Authors**: Werner Erhard, Michael C. Jensen, Steve Zaffron, and Kari Granger
- **Original Paper**: [SSRN Abstract #1263835](https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=1263835)
- **Course**: Harvard Business School Executive Education / Barbados Group

## Purpose & Fair Use Notice

These summaries are created for **educational and personal creative purposes** only. They serve as reference material and context for my own writing and thinking on leadership, integrity, and organizational effectiveness.

**This is not a reproduction of the original work.** These are interpretive summaries generated with the assistance of AI tools, intended to:

1. Help me internalize and apply the concepts in my own work
2. Provide context for AI-assisted writing on related topics
3. Serve as personal study notes
